title: Nucleophilic fluorine substitution reaction of α-carbonyl benzyl bromide, phenylthiofluoroalkyl bromide, and 2-bromo-2-phenoxyacetonitrile
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19062-19066
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03085K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Satoshi Mizuta, Tomoko Yamaguchi, Takeshi Ishikawa
This manuscript discloses the nucleophilic fluorination of various alkylbromides using EtN3·3HF, producing monofluorinated compounds including tertiary benzylfluoride.
